Current weight and balance report including list of equipment included in certificated weight empty, 
 and loading instructions when necessary, must be in each aircraft at the time of original certification

 control system).

The following placards must be displayed in front of and in clear view of the pilot: 
 (a) 
 "Do not extend landing gear above 115 mph." 
 (b) "Intentional spins prohibited."
